snippet: The battle for equal rights for same-sex couples has turned an important corner with an explosion of cases beginning to reach federal appellate courts for review.
abstract: Editorial notes that new round of cases concerning states' treatment of same-sex marriage is beginning to reach federal appellate courts for review, creating potential for issue to return to the Supreme Court; contends it is important for issue to return to court with expanded support and a critical mass of marriage-equality states, allowing Supreme Court justices to feel comfortable issuing opinion requiring marriage equality nationwide.
lead_paragraph: The battle for equal rights for same-sex couples has turned an important corner with an explosion of cases beginning to reach federal appellate courts for review.

headline.main: A Surge Forward on Marriage Equality
headline.print_headline: A Surge Forward on Marriage Equality

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
